products.title: Oslo Blackout Brittany Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This cool-toned brittany blue blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Quackers Pvc Blackout Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Instantly add something fun and quirky with quackers pvc blackout blue electric roller blind. It's is made of moisture resistant and flame retardant fabric so is ideal for kids rooms or bathroom, it features a selection of amusing rubber duckies sitting on top of blue pebbles. products.title: Whitby Pvc Blackout Navy Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Whitby pvc blackout navy blue is a fabulous boys blind in dark navy that features a super modern cityscape of houses and trees that really lends itself well to a contemporary space. The electric operation makes opening and closing this flame retardant blind super-easy and the blackout fabric prevents unwanted light travelling into your room on a bright day. What's more, it's made of moisture resistant material so you don't have to worry if it gets splashed with water.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Roller Blind
products.description: With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry blossom blackout kimono blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is pollergen treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen.
